GameSessionId.description: Unique identifier for the game session to update. Game session ID format is as follows: 'arn:aws:gamelift:<region>::gamesession/fleet-<fleet ID>/<ID string>'. The value of <ID string> is either a custom ID string (if one was specified when the game session was created) an autogenerated string.

MaximumPlayerSessionCount.description: Maximum number of players that can be simultaneously connected to the game session.

Name.description: Descriptive label associated with a game session. Session names do not need to be unique.

PlayerSessionCreationPolicy.description: Policy determining whether or not the game session accepts new players.

ProtectionPolicy.description: Game session protection policy to apply to this game session only.    NoProtection – The game session can be terminated during a scale-down event.    FullProtection – If the game session is in an ACTIVE status, it cannot be terminated during a scale-down event.
